title: Buy Now Pay Later (BNPL) purchase agreements (Affirm, Klarna)
dataVerified: Buyer name, merchant, purchase amount, payment schedule, terms
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents BNPL fraud (forged purchase agreements, inflated amounts). Domain binding verifies BNPL provider. Tamper-evident payment terms. Merchant verification. Credit bureau reporting accuracy. Consumer protection (dispute resolution).
